description:
Buongiorno! 

Learn Italian with 'Ciao Italian Course' by iLoveLingo.com - Now in HD! 

It is fun, fast and easy, and will teach you the language of romance in no time. Whether you want to learn some basic Italian or really get serious with the lingo, this is the right place to start! 

FEATURES: 
- Works on all webOS devices (Pre, Pixi, Veer, Touchpad, etc. etc.) 
- Easy, fun and fast, yet very comprehensive.
- 5 rapidly advancing lessons in HD graphics.
- Listen to 200 recorded phrases and words.
- Giovanni is your animated and dancing guide. 
- Varying exercises with text, audio, and images.
- No internet needed - study anywhere! 
- Works in both landscape and portrait on the HP Touchpad.
- For all ages - perfect for both homeschooling and adult learning.
- Developed by professional educators with more than 9 years of experience teaching online. 
- And much more!

For more info visit:

www.ilovelingo.com

Benvenuto!

PS: The YouTube video shows our 'iCaramba Spanish Course', but the courses are identical - except for the language of course :)
